thread.title: CBS: WKU football's Jared Dangerfield motivated after father's death
thread.title_full: CBS: WKU football's Jared Dangerfield motivated after father's death

author: courier-journal.com
title: CBS: WKU football's Jared Dangerfield motivated after father's death
text:
Jared Dangerifled has bounced back from injury suffered in fall camp to again measure up as one of Western Kentucky's top receivers a year after he became the Hilltoppers' record holder for catches in a season at 69.
What fuels the junior college receiver from Florida? CBS Sports Network, which broadcasts a handful of WKU's games this season, posted a video feature this week on Dangerfield, who lost his father to a heart attack while in high school.
Dangerfield told CBS his grades slipped, and he ended up at Fort Scott Community College before realizing his dream of playing top-level college football.
Now, "I feel his presence," the redshirt senior said. "I know he's watching over me."
See the video here: youtu.be/-zKPCyPiAhU .
